name: NFL GameDay 2004
description:
Back of Jewel Case - PlayStation (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Season Kicks Off Today!

Team in Control of Their Destiny
Total Control Tackling™ means you decide if you want to take a calculated risk and go for the big hit to jar the ball loose or make a sure wrap tackle on a slippery ball carrier. Total Control Passing™ allows you to lead your speedy wideout or under throw receivers in any direction by simply pressing the directional pad.

Roster Depth Proving to be Invaluable
Perfect your skills on offense and defense in Practice Mode before you guide your team to glory. Battle it out in Exhibition mode and bring home the championship in Season Mode. Play in multiple seasons as a coach, player and general manager, while drafting, trading and signing free agents over several seasons in General Manager Mode.

Coaching Staff Making All the Right Decisions
Advanced Artificial Intelligence has your opponents learning your tendencies on both sides of the ball. Pass every down and you will be using your back-up quarterback quicker than you would like. Blitz every down and helplessly watch as you're burned for a long touchdown reception.
